testsuite.name: TicTacToeTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #4
Expected: Player1 wins! Found: |---|---|---| | X | | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---|
Enter Player2's move as (x,y)
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter the first player's name (Player1 by default) > First player's name: Player1 Enter the second player's name (Player2 by default) > Second player's name: Player2 Enter the field size (3x3 by default) > Field size: 3x3 |---|---|---|-y | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | x Enter Player1's move as (x,y) > (2,1) |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | X | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---|
Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (2,1) Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (,1) Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > sdfsdfs Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (100,2) Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (2,2) |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---|
Enter Player1's move as (x,y) > (1,1) |---|---|---| | X | | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---|
Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (3,2) |---|---|---| | X | | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| | | O | | |---|---|---|
Enter Player1's move as (x,y) > (3,1) |---|---|---| | X | | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---|
Enter Player2's move as (x,y)
